title: League music on champ select
body: Is there a way to get rid of it? If not get to it please Rito. It's way too loud.{{item:3070}}

replies.body: Correct - the client has it's own music and sfx sliders. Also - you can always just minimize the client and it will mute the audio as well, if you like having music but need to mute it after you're finished in champ select.
In the home screen, there's a gear in the top right. Click that and turn the "Music" slider all the way down. This doesn't get rid of the music in-game.
